coreAttributes.name: saddle
coreAttributes.description: A supportive structure for a rider of an animal, which is fastened to the animal's back by a girth. It comes complete with stirrups, the height of which can be freely adjusted.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the saddle on [npc.her] back, before reaching around and fastening the buckles to keep it in place and then lowering the stirrups.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the saddle on [npc2.namePos] back, before fastening the buckles to keep it in place and then lowering the stirrups.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the saddle on [npc2.namePos] back, before fastening the buckles to keep it in place and then lowering the stirrups.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the saddle's straps and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the saddle's straps and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(unfasten)] the saddle's straps and [npc.verb(yank)] it off.
